ai-patthana18.25:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.25:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana18.25:2.1_0: Give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana18.25:3.1_0: You don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana18.25:4.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the teaching, the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana18.25:5.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana18.25:6.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana18.25:7.1_0: You don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana18.25:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana18.25:9.1_0: No cause is a condition for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana18.25:9.1_1: Not taking care of yourself, causes and conditions for the sake of convincing people.
ai-patthana18.25:11.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana18.25:12.1_0: not for the sake of heaven ...
ai-patthana18.25:13.1_0: It’s not possible for the sake of refuge to neither for the sake of refuge nor causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:14.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana18.25:15.1_0: But causes and conditions that give rise to the principle for the sake of refuge, and not for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana18.25:15.1_1: (All should be expanded with the sound of a partner.)
ai-patthana18.25:16.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge to the teaching ...
ai-patthana18.25:17.1_0: Not for the sake of knowing and seeing the sake of causes and conditions, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.25:18.1_0: Not for the sake of knowing and seeing the cause, not for the sake of cause.
